titlealts.searchtitle: Data Set: CDS V6-2-1 Type 011 - Emergency Care CDS - Specification

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 001 - CDS Interchange Header

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2-1 Type 001 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange HeaderOne per Interchange submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 003 - CDS Message Header

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2-1 Type 003 - Commissioning Data Set Message HeaderOne per Commissioning Data Set Message submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange

body.p: One of the following options must be used:

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 005N - CDS Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol

entry.p: Function: To carry Commissioning Data Set identification and addressing data and other data indicating the specific use of the Net Change Update Mechanism of the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2-1 Type 005N - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol One per Commissioning Data Set record submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 005B - CDS Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol

entry.p: Function: To carry Commissioning Data Set identification and addressing data and other data indicating the specific use of the Bulk Replacement Update Mechanism of the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2-1 Type 005B - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol One per Commissioning Data Set record submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.
To carry the details of the Patient Pathway.
DATA GROUP: REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD CHARACTERISTICS
To carry the Identity of the Patient.See Note: S3 in Commissioning Data Set Business Rules.
DATA GROUP: UNVERIFIED IDENTITY STRUCTUREMust be used for all other values of the NHS_NUMBER_STATUS_INDICATOR_CODENOT included in the above
DATA GROUP: WITHHELD IDENTITY STRUCTUREMust be used where the Commissioning Data Set record has been anonymised
DATA GROUP: VERIFIED IDENTITY STRUCTUREMust be used where the NHS_NUMBER_STATUS_INDICATOR_CODENational Code = 01 (Number present and verified)
To carry the characteristics of the Patient for an Emergency Care Attendance.
DATA GROUP: MENTAL HEALTH ACT LEGAL STATUS
To carry the patients Mental Health Act Legal Status.
To carry the Patient's General Medical Practitioner and the General Practice details.
DATA GROUP: EMERGENCY CARE ATTENDANCE LOCATION
To carry the details of the Emergency Care Attendance location.
To carry ambulance details relating to the patients arrival at Emergency Care.
DATA GROUP: EMERGENCY CARE ATTENDANCE ACTIVITY CHARACTERISTICS
To carry the characteristics of the Emergency Care Attendance.
To carry the details of injuries.
To carry patient clinical history details.
To carry the details of the Service Agreement.
To carry the details of the Care Professionals active during the Emergency Care Attendance.
DATA GROUP: EMERGENCY CARE DIAGNOSES (SNOMED CT)
To carry the details of SNOMED CT coded Clinical Diagnoses.
DATA GROUP: EMERGENCY CARE INVESTIGATIONS (SNOMED CT)
To carry the details of SNOMED CT coded Clinical Investigations.
DATA GROUP: EMERGENCY CARE TREATMENTS (SNOMED CT)
To carry the details of SNOMED CT coded Procedures.
DATA GROUP: REFERRALS TO OTHER SERVICES
To carry the details of referrals to other services.
DATA GROUP: DISCHARGE FROM EMERGENCY CARE
To carry the details of discharge from Emergency Care.
DATA GROUP: RESEARCH AND DISEASE OUTBREAK NOTIFICATION
To carry details of any Research and/or Disease Outbreak Notifications.

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 004 - CDS Message Trailer

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2-1 Type 004 - Commissioning Data Set Message Trailer One per Commissioning Data Set Message submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service. Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 002 - CDS Interchange Trailer

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2-1 Type 002 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange Trailer One per Interchange submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange
